meanings.definition: Test again to check previous results.
meanings.sent1: She decided to retest the experiment to make sure the data was accurate.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is retesting the students on their knowledge of multiplication tables.
meanings.sent3: After failing the first time, he knew he had to retest to improve his score.
meanings.sent4: The athlete is retesting his limits to see how much he has improved.
meanings.sent5: The scientist is retesting the hypothesis to confirm the findings.

meanings.definition: The act of conducting a test again.
meanings.sent1: The retesting of the samples revealed consistent results.
meanings.sent2: The retesting of the product showed no significant changes.
meanings.sent3: The retesting process can sometimes be tedious but is necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: The retesting of the theory led to new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The retesting of the equipment ensured its reliability.
